fields.name: power
fields.description: Base power - power of the debuff before multipliers

fields.name: drainStat
fields.description: Affected stat - the stat to drain from the enemy

fields.name: attackStat
fields.description: Attack stat - this stat is halved and then multiplied by power

fields.name: defendStat
fields.description: Defend stat - this stat is subtracted from incoming stat drain

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
